// <auto-generated/>
using System;
using System.Buffers;
using System.Buffers.Binary;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using System.Text;
using FourSer.Contracts;
using System.IO;
using FourSer.Gen.Helpers;
using SpanReader = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.RoSpanReaderHelpers;
using StreamReader = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamReaderHelpers;
using SpanWriter = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers;
using StreamWriter = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamWriterHelpers;

namespace FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.SimplePacket;

public partial class LoginPacket : ISerializable<LoginPacket>
{
    public static int GetPacketSize(LoginPacket obj)
    {
        if (obj is null) return 0;
        var size = 0;
        size += sizeof(byte); // Size for unmanaged type Result
        size += sizeof(uint); // Size for unmanaged type UserID
        size += StringEx.MeasureSize(obj.Username); // Size for string Username
        return size;
    }

    private LoginPacket(byte result, uint userID, string username)
    {
        this.Result = result;
        this.UserID = userID;
        this.Username = username;
    }

    public LoginPacket()
    {
        this.Result = default;
        this.UserID = default;
        this.Username = default;
    }

    public static LoginPacket Deserialize(ref System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        var result = SpanReader.ReadByte(ref buffer);
        var userID = SpanReader.ReadUInt32(ref buffer);
        var username = SpanReader.ReadString(ref buffer);
        var obj = new LoginPacket(result, userID, username);
        return obj;
    }

    public static LoginPacket Deserialize(System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        return Deserialize(ref buffer);
    }

    public static LoginPacket Deserialize(System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        var result = StreamReader.ReadByte(stream);
        var userID = StreamReader.ReadUInt32(stream);
        var username = StreamReader.ReadString(stream);
        var obj = new LoginPacket(result, userID, username);
        return obj;
    }

    public static void Serialize(LoginPacket obj, ref System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        if (obj is null) return;
        SpanWriter.WriteByte(ref data, (byte)(obj.Result));
        SpanWriter.WriteUInt32(ref data, (uint)(obj.UserID));
        SpanWriter.WriteString(ref data, obj.Username);
    }

    public static void Serialize(LoginPacket obj, System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        Serialize(obj, ref data);
    }

    public static void Serialize(LoginPacket obj, System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        if (obj is null) return;
        StreamWriter.WriteByte(stream, (byte)(obj.Result));
        StreamWriter.WriteUInt32(stream, (uint)(obj.UserID));
        StreamWriter.WriteString(stream, obj.Username);
    }
}
